video_prompt: A female cyborg with long, dark red hair gently sways in a subtle wind. Her pearlescent cybernetic suit features cyan-blue lines that pulse with internal energy, while intricate orange and blue circuitry within her chest module flickers. Her intense gaze slowly scans a desolate, rocky landscape as light dust or snow drifts. She subtly adjusts her grip on her futuristic weapon, her expression shifting from focused intensity to determined readiness.
image_prompt:
Here are a few options, ranging from more detailed to super concise:

**Option 1 (Detailed & Comprehensive):**
"Hyperdetailed digital art of a futuristic female cyborg. She has long, flowing, dark red windblown hair, fair skin, intense grey-green eyes with subtle cybernetic marks near the left eye. She wears a pearlescent white, segmented cybernetic suit with glowing cyan-blue lines and a circular glowing orange/blue energy core on her chest. Black tactical straps crisscross her torso. Her left arm is seamlessly white cybernetic, raised with hand behind head. Her right arm is robust, dark grey mechanical with cyan glowing accents, gripping a futuristic dark SMG with subtle cyan glow. She wears dark tactical pants and has a rifle visible on her back. Minimalist, desolate white and light grey background with scattered rocky debris. Bright, diffuse lighting, metallic gleam. Sci-fi, cyberpunk aesthetic."

**Option 2 (Balanced & Concise):**
"Hyperdetailed digital art: Futuristic female cyborg. Long dark red windblown hair, intense grey-green eyes with subtle cybernetic marks. Pearlescent white segmented cybernetic suit, glowing cyan-blue lines, circular orange/blue chest core. Black tactical harness. Left arm seamless white cybernetic, hand behind head. Right arm robust dark mechanical with cyan glow, gripping futuristic dark SMG. Dark tactical pants, rifle on back. Minimalist desolate white/light grey rocky background. Bright diffuse lighting, metallic gleam. Sci-fi, cyberpunk."

**Option 3 (Super Concise - Keywords Focused):**
"Highly detailed female cyborg, dark red windblown hair, intense grey-green eyes, subtle cybernetic facial marks. Pearlescent white segmented cybernetic suit, glowing cyan-blue lines, orange/blue chest core. Black tactical harness. One seamless white cybernetic arm (hand behind head), one robust dark mechanical arm with cyan glow gripping futuristic SMG. Dark tactical pants, rifle. Minimalist desolate white/light grey rocky background. Bright diffuse lighting, metallic gleam. Digital art, sci-fi, cyberpunk."

**Recommended:** For most models, **Option 2** offers a good balance of detail and conciseness, providing enough information for distinct features without being overly wordy.
refined_video_prompt: Long, dark red hair gently sways. Cyan-blue lines pulse with internal energy; orange and blue circuitry flickers. An intense gaze slowly scans as light dust or snow drifts. A grip subtly adjusts, and an expression shifts from focused intensity to determined readiness.
